root.name: Trauma Center: New Blood
root.description: IntroductionTrauma Center New blood is the sequel to Trauma Center Second Opinion.Â Trauma Center places you in the shoes of Markus Vaughn and Valerie Blalock as they move from hospital to hospital, helping injured people and also researching and fighting a mysterious virus known as STIGMA. Although wearing the Trauma Center name, New Blood does not feature the same characters or plot as Under the Knife or Second Opinion; nor is it related to Under The Knife 2, which is a true sequel to the original DS game.GameplayUnlike the original Trauma Center on Nintendo Wii which included only some light multi player features (1 player would do the operation while the other would hand him the needed tools) in Trauma Center New Blood both the players can operate simultaneously. Nintendo Wi-Fi connectionTrauma Center New Blood utilises the Nintendo Wi-Fi connection but only for online leader boards.
